metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2084 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Sensitive data could be exposed in world readable logs of cloud-init beforeversion 22.3 when schema failures are reported. This leak could includehashed passwords.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cloud-init - 22.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cloud-init package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.3').
